actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the authority for financial assistance for supportive services for very low-income veteran families in permanent housing, and for other purposes.
short_title: Keeping Our Commitment to Ending Veteran Homelessness Act of 2022

summary.text:
Keeping Our Commitment to Ending Veteran Homelessness Act of 2022

This bill reauthorizes through FY2024 the Supportive Services for Veterans Families program (which provides financial assistance for supportive services for very low-income veteran families in permanent housing or transitioning from homelessness) and the program that provides additional and comprehensive services for homeless veterans at certain locations.

titles.title: Keeping Our Commitment to Ending Veteran Homelessness Act of 2022
Keeping Our Commitment to Ending Veteran Homelessness Act of 2022

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the authority for financial assistance for supportive services for very low-income veteran families in permanent housing, and for other purposes.
